["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://guix.gnu.org/","rel":"nofollow","children":"GNU/Guix"}]," 是隶属于 GNU 项目的自由软件发行版。Guix 可以作为独立的操作系统发行版安装在计算机上，可以作为软件包管理器安装在别的 Linux 发行版上。
它的核心是一个函数式软件包管理器，支持事务性的升级、回滚操作。用户可以通过 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.gnu.org/software/guile/","rel":"nofollow","children":"Guile"}]," 语言编写配置文件管理操作系统的服务或者管理用户安装的软件。"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"使用方法","children":"使用方法"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["修改 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"~/.config/guix/channels.scm"}]," 文件即可在 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"guix pull"}]," 时使用 Git 镜像："]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"(list (channel
       (inherit (car %default-channels))
       (url "{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}")))","codeLanguage":"scheme"}]]}]

meta.title: Guix Git 镜像使用帮助
